name: Craft ADV Essence Short Tights - Women's
description:
Compressive shorts for high-intensity training sessions or runs. The longer length provides ample coverage and a snug fit.Supportive and wicking recycled polyester blend with plenty of stretch.Snug elastic for a secure fit.Zippered rear pocket keeps keys or gels secure.
